Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Goblet with a conical rounded base, slightly flared mouth and simple lip. The uneven surface is pink-beige. It does not bear any slip but has a few blackish patches caused by fire clouding. The vessel has been simply polished, although more carefully on the outside than on the inside.
